name: Saltmarsh Plains
role_in_state: bulk salt supplier and estuarine food source
culture_adjustments: tide-calendar rituals outrank distant-star navigational rites locally
fewer Island Creole loanwords; conservative Coastal Tongues forms persist
salt-harvest labor guilds dominate coastal social structure
seasonal shoreward/ upland labor migration tied to tides
constraints: limited high-quality timber for large shipbuilding
seasonal access dependent on high tides
ritual magic costs rise due to imported reagent needs
notes: principal bulk salt supplier for State_7 trade networks
local Sea-Tide rites timed to salt-harvest and embankment works
constant dredging and embankment maintenance required
